plot: Here we explore some of the not so subtle, yet hilarious differences between girls and guys. Find out what takes place after a lovers' spat between Charlotte and Jack, and just how much trouble can be caused in forty hours.
title: 40 Hours
plot_es: Here we explore some of the not so subtle, yet hilarious differences between girls and guys. Find out what takes place after a lovers' spat between Charlotte and Jack, and just how much trouble can be caused in forty hours.
